sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectMasterCdDataByCompany */
SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.ID , A.INDUSTRY_CD , C.MASTER_CD FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A , HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B , HETB_CK_LINKED_MASTER C WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = B.INDUSTRY_CD AND A.INDUSTRY_CD = C.INDUSTRY_CD AND A.ID = #id# AND A.STATUS ='N'

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectCompanyInfo */
SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COMPANY_CD DESC) RNUM , A.COMPANY_CD , A.ID COMPANY_ID , A.COMPANY SANGHO_NAME , A.SA_NO NUMBER1 , A.PHARMACIST_NO NUMBER2 , A.CEO_NAME NAME1 , A.TEL TEL , A.FAX FAX , A.HP HP , A.ADDR1 ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 ADDR2 , A.EMAIL EMAIL , B.DIVIDE_CD FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A INNER JOIN HETB_CK_INDUSTRY B ON B.INDUSTRY_CD = A.INDUSTRY_CD WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.ID = '$id$' ) AA WHERE AA.RNUM = 1

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectCompanyTypeInfo */
SELECT CASE TYPYE_CD WHEN '' THEN '00' ELSE TYPYE_CD END TYPE_CD FROM ( SELECT REPLACE((TYPYE1+TYPYE2+TYPYE3+TYPYE4+TYPYE5+ TYPYE6+TYPYE7+TYPYE8+TYPYE9+TYPYE10+TYPYE11), '', ',') TYPYE_CD FROM ( SELECT CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_01_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '01' END TYPYE1 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_02_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '02' END TYPYE2 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_03_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '03' END TYPYE3 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_04_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '04' END TYPYE4 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_05_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '05' END TYPYE5 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_06_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '06' END TYPYE6 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_07_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '07' END TYPYE7 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_08_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '08' END TYPYE8 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_09_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '09' END TYPYE9 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_10_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '10' END TYPYE10 , CASE ISNULL(MAX(TYPE_CD_11_YN), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '11' END TYPYE11 FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) )

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectCheckStateListTotCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HETB_CK_MASTER A RIGHT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_ANSWER B ON A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_ANSWER C ON C.COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ LEFT OUTER JOIN HETB_CK_ANSWER D ON D.STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' AND CONVERT(CHAR(10), START_DT, 120) <= CONVERT(CHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120) AND A.TYPE_CD IN ($find_type_cd$)

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectMaster */
SELECT MASTER_CD , TYPE_CD , TITLE , START_DT , END_DT , ATTACHFILE1 , ATTACHFILEORG1 , ATTACHTYPE1 , INSERT_DT , INSERT_IP , INSERT_ID , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_IP , UPDATE_ID , CONTENTS , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) QUESTION_CNT , CASE WHEN (CONVERT(CHAR(10), START_DT, 120) >= CONVERT(CHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120)) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END GIGAN_OPEN_YN FROM HETB_CK_MASTER WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N'

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectQuestion */
SELECT A.QUESTION_CD , A.QUESTION , A.QUEST_TYPE_CD , A.MULTI_CHECK_YN , A.OTHER_YN , B.QUESTION2_CD , B.OTHER FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MASTER_CD , COMPANY_CD , QUESTION_CD , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(QUESTION2_CD,',')),',') QUESTION2_CD , REPLACE(LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(OTHER,'º')),'º'), 'º', '') OTHER FROM ( SELECT MASTER_CD , COMPANY_CD , QUESTION_CD , (':'+QUESTION2_CD+':') QUESTION2_CD , REPLACE(OTHER, 'º', '') OTHER , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MASTER_CD, COMPANY_CD, QUESTION_CD ORDER BY QUESTION_CD, QUESTION2_CD) SPAN FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 WHERE MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ) START WITH SPAN = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR MASTER_CD = MASTER_CD AND PRIOR COMPANY_CD = COMPANY_CD AND PRIOR QUESTION_CD = QUESTION_CD AND PRIOR SPAN = SPAN -1 GROUP BY MASTER_CD, COMPANY_CD, QUESTION_CD ) B ON A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.QUESTION_CD = B.QUESTION_CD WHERE A.MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND A.STATUS = 'N' /* AND A.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD AND A.QUESTION_CD = B.QUESTION_CD */ ORDER BY A.QUESTION_CD ASC

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectAnswer */
SELECT QUESTION2_CD , QUESTION2 , VALIDATION FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION2 WHERE QUESTION1_CD = $question_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$ AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ORDERBY ASC

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectHandleItemList */
SELECT HANDLE_CD , ITEM_NAME , UNIT , FIELD1 , FIELD2 , FIELD3 , FIELD4 , YEAR_CD , COMPANY_CD , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_NAME , STATUS FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$'
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckUserDAO.insertHandleItem */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM ( HANDLE_CD , ITEM_NAME , UNIT , FIELD1 , FIELD2 , FIELD3 , FIELD4 , YEAR_CD , COMPANY_CD , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_NAME , STATUS ) VALUES ( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(HANDLE_CD), 0) + 1 FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM) , '$item_name$' , '$unit$' , '$field1$' , '$field2$' , '$field3$' , '$field4$' , '$year_cd$' , $company_cd$ , '$company_id$' , '$company_name$' , '$status$' )
sqlMap.update:
/* FreecheckUserDAO.updateHandleItem */
UPDATE HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM SET ITEM_NAME = '$item_name$' , UNIT = '$unit$' , FIELD1 = '$field1$' , FIELD2 = '$field2$' , FIELD3 = '$field3$' , FIELD4 = '$field4$' , YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' , COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ , COMPANY_ID = '$company_id$' , COMPANY_NAME = '$company_name$' WHERE HANDLE_CD = $handle_cd$
sqlMap.insert:
/* FreecheckUserDAO.checkQuestion */
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_ANSWER ( answer_cd , company_cd , company_id , master_cd , sangho_name , number1 , number2 , number3 , name1 , jumin1 , name2 , jumin2 , name3 , jumin3 , addr1 , addr2 , email , tel , hp , fax , homepage , room_cnt , work_time1 , work_time2 , work_time3 , cnt1 , cnt2 , cnt3 , cnt4 , cnt5 , cnt6 , cnt7 , cnt8 , cnt9 , article1_yn , article2_yn , article3_yn , article4_yn , article5_yn , article6_yn , article7_yn , article8_yn , article9_yn , other1 , other2 , other3 , other4 , other5 , other6 , other7 , other8 , attachfile1 , attachfileorg1 , attachtype1 , status , insert_dt , insert_ip , insert_id , update_dt , update_ip , update_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(answer_cd), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER) , $company_cd$ , '$company_id$' , $master_cd$ , '$sangho_name$' , '$number1$' , '$number2$' , '$number3$' , '$name1$' , '$jumin1$' , '$name2$' , '$jumin2$' , '$name3$' , '$jumin3$' , '$addr1$' , '$addr2$' , '$email$' , '$tel$' , '$hp$' , '$fax$' , '$homepage$' , $room_cnt$ , '$work_time1$' , '$work_time2$' , '$work_time3$' , $cnt1$ , $cnt2$ , $cnt3$ , $cnt4$ , $cnt5$ , $cnt6$ , $cnt7$ , $cnt8$ , $cnt9$ , '$article1_yn$' , '$article2_yn$' , '$article3_yn$' , '$article4_yn$' , '$article5_yn$' , '$article6_yn$' , '$article7_yn$' , '$article8_yn$' , '$article9_yn$' , '$other1$' , '$other2$' , '$other3$' , '$other4$' , '$other5$' , '$other6$' , '$other7$' , '$other8$' , '$attachfile1$' , '$attachfileorg1$' , '$attachtype1$' , '$status$' , GETDATE() , '$insert_ip$' , '$insert_id$' , GETDATE() , '$update_ip$' , '$update_id$' )

INSERT INTO HETB_CK_ANSWER2 ( ANSWER2_CD , COMPANY_CD , COMPANY_ID , MASTER_CD , QUESTION_CD , QUESTION2_CD , OTHER) VALUES( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ANSWER2_CD), 0)+1 FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2) , $company_cd$ , '$company_id$' , $master_cd$ , $question_cd$ , $question2_cd$ , '$other$')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HETB_CK_COMPANY SET COMPANY = '$sangho_name$' , SA_NO = '$number1$' , CEO_NAME = '$name1$' , TEL = '$tel$' , FAX = '$fax$' , HP = '$hp$' , ADDR2 = '$addr2$' , EMAIL = '$email$' WHERE company_cd = $company_cd$

UPDATE HETB_CK_ANSWER SET company_cd = $company_cd$ , company_id = '$company_id$' , master_cd = $master_cd$ , sangho_name = '$sangho_name$' , number1 = '$number1$' , number2 = '$number2$' , number3 = '$number3$' , name1 = '$name1$' , jumin1 = '$jumin1$' , name2 = '$name2$' , jumin2 = '$jumin2$' , name3 = '$name3$' , jumin3 = '$jumin3$' , addr1 = '$addr1$' , addr2 = '$addr2$' , email = '$email$' , tel = '$tel$' , hp = '$hp$' , fax = '$fax$' , homepage = '$homepage$' , room_cnt = $room_cnt$ , work_time1 = '$work_time1$' , work_time2 = '$work_time2$' , work_time3 = '$work_time3$' , cnt1 = $cnt1$ , cnt2 = $cnt2$ , cnt3 = $cnt3$ , cnt4 = $cnt4$ , cnt5 = $cnt5$ , cnt6 = $cnt6$ , cnt7 = $cnt7$ , cnt8 = $cnt8$ , cnt9 = $cnt9$ , article1_yn = '$article1_yn$' , article2_yn = '$article2_yn$' , article3_yn = '$article3_yn$' , article4_yn = '$article4_yn$' , article5_yn = '$article5_yn$' , article6_yn = '$article6_yn$' , article7_yn = '$article7_yn$' , article8_yn = '$article8_yn$' , article9_yn = '$article9_yn$' , other1 = '$other1$' , other2 = '$other2$' , other3 = '$other3$' , other4 = '$other4$' , other5 = '$other5$' , other6 = '$other6$' , other7 = '$other7$' , other8 = '$other8$' , attachfile1 = '$attachfile1$' , attachfileorg1 = '$attachfileorg1$' , attachtype1 = '$attachtype1$' , status = '$status$' , update_dt = GETDATE() , update_ip = '$update_ip$' , update_id = '$update_id$' WHERE answer_cd = $answer_cd$
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 WHERE COMPANY_CD = $company_cd$ AND MASTER_CD = $master_cd$
sqlMap.select:
/* FreecheckUserDAO.checkListState */
SELECT b.MASTER_CD, a.ARTICLE9_YN, b.TYPE_CD, ISNULL(b.CNT, 0) as QUESTION_CNT, ISNULL(a.ANSWER_CNT, 0) as ANSWER_CNT, ISNULL(a.ANSWER2_CNT, 0) as ANSWER2_CNT, b.START_DT, b.END_DT, b.TITLE FROM ( SELECT A.ID, B.MASTER_CD, ISNULL(B.CNT, 0) AS ANSWER_CNT, ISNULL(C.CNT, 0) AS ANSWER2_CNT, B.ARTICLE9_YN FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.COMPANY_ID) AS CNT, z.ARTICLE9_YN FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE z.COMPANY_ID = '$id$' AND y.MASTER_CD IN ($masterCdData$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TITLE, z.ARTICLE9_YN ) B ON A.ID = B.COMPANY_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.COMPANY_ID) AS CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE z.COMPANY_ID = '$id$' AND y.MASTER_CD IN ($masterCdData$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' AND y.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' GROUP BY z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE ) C ON A.ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE A.ID = '$id$' AND A.STATUS = 'N' AND C.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD ) a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.QUESTION_CD) AS CNT, y.START_DT, y.END_DT FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE y.MASTER_CD IN ($masterCdData$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' AND y.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' GROUP BY z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, y.START_DT, y.END_DT ) b ON b.MASTER_CD = a.MASTER_CD ORDER BY TYPE_CD

/* FreecheckUserDAO.selectNextFreecheck */
SELECT b.MASTER_CD, ISNULL(a.ARTICLE9_YN, 'N') as ARTICLE9_YN, b.TYPE_CD, ISNULL(b.CNT, 0) as QUESTION_CNT, ISNULL(a.ANSWER_CNT, 0) as ANSWER_CNT, ISNULL(a.ANSWER2_CNT, 0) as ANSWER2_CNT, b.START_DT, b.END_DT, b.TITLE FROM ( SELECT A.ID, B.MASTER_CD, ISNULL(B.CNT, 0) AS ANSWER_CNT, ISNULL(C.CNT, 0) AS ANSWER2_CNT, B.ARTICLE9_YN FROM HETB_CK_COMPANY A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.COMPANY_ID) AS CNT, z.ARTICLE9_YN FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE z.COMPANY_ID = '$id$' AND y.TYPE_CD IN ($find_type_cd$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TITLE, z.ARTICLE9_YN ) B ON b.MASTER_CD = a.MASTER_CD , ( SELECT z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.COMPANY_ID) AS CNT FROM HETB_CK_ANSWER2 z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE z.COMPANY_ID = '$id$' AND y.TYPE_CD IN ($find_type_cd$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' AND y.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' GROUP BY z.COMPANY_ID, z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE ) C WHERE A.ID = '$id$' AND A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.ID = B.COMPANY_ID(+) AND A.ID = C.COMPANY_ID(+) AND C.MASTER_CD = B.MASTER_CD) a , ( SELECT z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, COUNT(z.QUESTION_CD) AS CNT, y.START_DT, y.END_DT FROM HETB_CK_QUESTION z, HETB_CK_MASTER y WHERE y.TYPE_CD IN ($find_type_cd$) AND y.MASTER_CD = z.MASTER_CD AND z.STATUS = 'N' AND y.YEAR_CD = '$year_cd$' AND y.MASTER_CD <> $master_cd$ GROUP BY z.MASTER_CD, y.TYPE_CD, y.TITLE, y.START_DT, y.END_DT ) b ORDER BY TYPE_CD
SELECT A.ITEM_ID, A.ITEM_NAME, A.MASTER_CD, A.EXCEPT_NUM, CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DATE, 120) AS REG_DATE, A.YEAR_CD FROM HETB_CK_ITEM A WHERE A.MASTER_CD = #masterCd#
SELECT HANDLE_CD,ITEM_NAME,UNIT,COMPANY_CD,COMPANY_ID,COMPANY_NAME,YEAR_CD,ORDER_NO,STATUS, FIELD1,FIELD2,FIELD3,FIELD4,FIELD5 FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_ID = #id# AND YEAR_CD = #year_cd#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT CONVERT(INT, '0' + Max(HANDLE_CD))+1 FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM
INSERT INTO HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM ( HANDLE_CD,ITEM_NAME,UNIT,COMPANY_CD,COMPANY_ID,COMPANY_NAME,YEAR_CD,ORDER_NO,STATUS, FIELD1,FIELD2,FIELD3,FIELD4,FIELD5 ) VALUES ( #handleCd#,#itemName#,#unit#,#companyCd#,#companyId#,#companyName#,#yearCd#,#orderNo#,#status#, #field1#,#field2#,#field3#,#field4#,#field5# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HETB_CK_HANDLEITEM WHERE COMPANY_ID = #id# AND YEAR_CD = #year_cd#
